name: Klubb
tagline: A system to manage your club. Open-Source and everything. Built using our favourite tools: CodeIgniter, Foundation and SQL.
body:
# What is it?
Klubb is an engine for a member database.
# Who's it for?
Anybody who maintains a club or organization. It's built for the non-profit organization "Ung Cancer" so it's primarily designed to fit their needs.
# Who's done it?
Klubb is designed and built by Ny f√•gel in Sundsvall, Sweden.
# How's it built?
Built using [CodeIgniter](https://github.com/EllisLab/CodeIgniter), [ZURB Foundation](https://github.com/zurb/foundation), PostgreSQL and a Raspberry Pi!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
